justification: “A metacognitive monitoring score captured instances of error detection and following the given instructions.”

measured_by: Picture-pair Metamemory Task (prospective & retrospective judgement indices)
justification: “This adaptation of a standard metamemory task … measures participants' memory of a pair of images and metacognitive evaluation of the memory,” using prospective and retrospective judgements for each picture pair.
